channel.title: Projects on David Shibu
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on David Shibu

item.title: Kochi Water Metro Management System
item.description: Flask-based web application enabling unified access for passengers, employees, and administrators of the Kochi Water Metro system.

item.title: SafePaws: Deep Learning System for Stray Dog Behavior Monitoring
item.description: A multi-stage AI surveillance framework using YOLOv8, ResNet, and LSTMs to detect, track, and predict stray dog behavior to prevent human-animal conflict.

item.title: Krishi Sahay: Multilingual AI Voice Assistant for Farmers
item.description: An AI-powered IVR system leveraging Twilio and LLMs to provide farmers with real-time market data, weather updates, and resource booking in their native languages.

item.title: Real-Time Voice Scam Detector using BERT
item.description: An AI-driven security tool that transcribes live calls and uses a fine-tuned BERT model to classify potential scams based on conversational context and intent.

item.title: Fusion Reality Virtual Science Lab
item.description: National hackathonâ€“winning virtual lab platform integrated with OLABS for immersive science education.

item.title: Smart City Using IoT
item.description: IoT-based smart city simulation integrating autonomous traffic control, real-time navigation, and emergency response systems.

item.title: Affordable Hearing Aid Prototype
item.description: Low-cost hearing aid prototype designed using mono-audio components to improve accessibility for the hearing-impaired.

item.title: Health Tracker Application
item.description: Java-based desktop application for analyzing daily health metrics and providing actionable wellness insights.
